## Monkey named Bob

Ona there was a monkey named Bob,

Who munched on a corn on a cob;

and said he was full

and felt very dull.

and said he would eat, sleep and sob.


- [limerick:](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Limerick_(poetry)) 五行打油诗
